text:
Plenty of queries around #Christmas 

Ok, here goes! 

(Caveat:  You don’t HAVE to follow it in a democracy) 

In my opinion? 

If you have #Diabetes, spend #Christmas at home & avoid mingling this year 

The risks #COVID19 are high & #Vaccine is around the corner 

Thank you 💙 https://t.co/hMeso5DJFh
